column5: Me and Al decided to go to rice for a few hours. I don't like Rice unless the bass are in season and told him I don't have confidence targeting pickerel in that lake. But it was close by and we needed to kill a few hours.  Launched and left the marina. Immediately we are on a weed flat. I find the edge. Alex casts and bang, fish on. A 3lb pickeral. We tried to work the weed line but the weedline is irregular and the wind was brutal! Al caught a LM bass and that was it. We needed to head for cover. Fished behind the islands, sheltered from the winds with no luck.  We tried a few more Islands with no luck. Went back in front of the marina. I hooked a smallie but it shook off. Decided to call it a night. I still had a hangover from the night before and was hungry.  Anyways, we get to the launch and don't we see a guy with a cooler? And guess whats inside? A number of decent sized large mouth bass.........It wont be long till Rice lake's fishing population is devastated.
Uh oh.....here we go!!!!   (Should have thrown the cooler in the lake!)
yep mini report for sure. How's the hangover?
Unbelievable, well, I beleive ya..just astonished that people still get away with that cow pie.  Especially on a popular lake like rice.  Glad you guys hooked into some fish.
Thanks for the mini report Johnny!  Unfortunately we'll always run into people who will keep out of season fish...knowingly or unknowingly.
ridonkulous!     But at least u caught some fish -- so that was good

That is unfortunate!  Maybe as fishermen we should be educating those that are not so educated.  I once did not know everything there is to know and till this day still learning, however with the help of the board and research I have been able to figure thing out just fine.  As a group we can try to better our fishery.  My two cents.  Thanks for the report Johnny Bass.
Should have just shot the guy and thrown the fish back in the lake.  Problem solved.

yea it was terrible....was looking for the # for the ministry the whole time...that dude should go straight to jail....makes me sick on a happier note....heres the pic of the the Walter that is still swimming and a couple pike Johny and I got in the rain at cooks.
Great report, Great t-shirt  Multivitamins help a hangover.
nice report guys !! Damn poachers !! they are everywhere !

nice job Johnny........I hate it when you get into a walleye  right as you arrive on the water..gets your hopes up and then get nothing else for the rest of the day...truely a kick in the nuts , but its still better than getting skunked I guess...Rice can get rather annoying right know with the weeds coming up everywhere, which adds to the frustration of no fish!!!
